intro.whyWhatIsAster: Aster is a management app for animal welfare associations.
intro.whyHowHelps: By bringing your volunteers together and centralizing data about your animals and foster families, Aster becomes the shared, connected memory of your association.
intro.howFirstParagraph: Create an account, register your association, invite members to join, then add your foster families and animals.
intro.howSecondParagraph: 100% free and ad-free, Aster has a single goal: helping those who do everything they can to help animals.
intro.whatsNextParagraph1: Once your foster families and animals are listed, you can easily track vaccine reminders, available foster homes, and ongoing adoptions.
intro.whatsNextParagraph2: Aster aims to help without constraining, which is why most information is optional: you decide what matters to you.
intro.whatsNextParagraph3: The app is constantly evolving, with new features regularly on the way!

changelog.title: What‚Äôs new in Aster?
items0123: Improved security when editing an animal or a foster family.
Email notifications are now sent when a member requests to join an association, and when that request is approved.
items0130: You can now transfer the admin role of an organization to another approved member.

families.tips: You can use a family to represent a shelter, a cattery room, or any other hosting place.

register.subject: Welcome to Aster!
register.accountCreated: Your Aster account has been created!
register.p1: Aster is an open-source app, free and ad-free, designed to simplify the work of animal welfare associations.
register.p2: Built by a single person, it evolves gradually: some features will come over time and a few imperfections may remain ‚Äî thanks for your patience and understanding.
register.p3: Whether you are a volunteer, a foster family, or a member of an association, I hope Aster helps you save time so you can focus on what matters most: the animals.

resetPassword.subject: Aster ‚Äì reset your password
resetPassword.intro: You requested to reset your Aster password.
resetPassword.ctaIntro: To choose a new password, click the link below:
resetPassword.expiry: This link is valid for 1 hour. After that, you‚Äôll need to request a new reset link.
resetPassword.ignore: If you didn‚Äôt request this, you can ignore this email.

orgRequestApproved.subject: Aster ‚Äì membership to {orgName} approved
orgRequestApproved.content1: You are receiving this message because you submitted a membership request to {orgName} in the application.
orgRequestApproved.content2: This request has just been approved by the association administrator.
orgRequestApproved.content3: You can now access the association‚Äôs features in Aster.

orgRequestSend.subject: Aster ‚Äì membership request to {orgName}
orgRequestSend.content1: You are receiving this message because a membership request has been submitted to {orgName}, where you are an administrator.
orgRequestSend.content3: To approve or reject this request, open the app and go to the "Organizations" section.
